Reference

Workflow Methods

hypeR()

Perform hyper enrichment

hyp_to_excel()

Export hyp/multihyp object to excel

hyp_to_table()

Export hyp/multihyp object to table

hyp_to_rmd()

Export hyp object to rmarkdown

hyp_show()

Convert hyp object to an interactive datatable

hyp_dots()

Visualize hyp/multihyp objects as a dots plot

hyp_emap()

Visualize hyp/multihyp objects as an enrichment map

hyp_hmap()

Visualize hyp/multihyp objects as a hiearchy map

Data Methods

hyperdb_info()

Print hypeR-db gsets

hyperdb_fetch()

Fetch gsets from hypeR-db

msigdb_info()

Print msigdb gsets

msigdb_fetch()

Fetch gsets from msigdb

msigdb_download_one()

Fetch gsets from msigdb

msigdb_download_all()

Download all gsets from msigdb for a species

Classes

hyp

A hyp object

multihyp

A multihyp object

pvector

A push/pop capable vector

rgsets

Relational genesets
